title: [Large-Scale] Machine Learning Exploration for Predicting Cardiovascular Diseases

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge (physiology, data analysis concepts) and smartphone usage experience
context.additional_context: Experiential learning environment using smartphones and simple VR devices, with limited cloud-based analytical tools

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain five or more major risk factors for cardiovascular diseases
Learners can simulate the process of analyzing virtual patient data using machine learning models (classification/prediction)
Learners can visualize and interpret disease risk levels based on health data collected in VR environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
